languages.text:
The Cyber-Eagle now interacts with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Exploits{/g}.
{g|f:98362e16cc3a4e7f9ce63039186c2b23}Obstruct Vision{/g} also provokes AGI Save (-{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76}) from target. On a failure, it applies {uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Exploits{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The Cyber-Eagle now interacts with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Exploits{/g}.
{g|f:98362e16cc3a4e7f9ce63039186c2b23}Obstruct Vision{/g} also provokes AGI Save (-{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76}) from target. On a failure, it applies {uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Exploits{/g}.

languages.text:
When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-eagle gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
When the cyber-eagle inflicts {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} on an enemy, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Атакуя цель, на которую наложены {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимости{/g}, киберорел получает такой же бонус к наносимому урону, как и его {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g}. Аналогично атаки фамильяра снимают все {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимости{/g} с цели.
Когда киберорел накладывает на цель эффект {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g}, она выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} и в случае провала получает {uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимостей{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-eagle gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
When the cyber-eagle inflicts {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} on an enemy, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}.

When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-eagle gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
When the cyber-eagle inflicts {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} on an enemy, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}.

When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-eagle gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
When the cyber-eagle inflicts {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} on an enemy, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}.

languages.text:
Cuando ataca a un objetivo que tiene {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnerabilidades{/g}, la ciberáguila obtiene la misma bonificación al daño que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}. Su ataque elimina todas las {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnerabilidades{/g} del objetivo.
Cuando la ciberáguila causa el efecto {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} a un enemigo, dicho enemigo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} o recibirá +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnerabilidades{/g}.
languages.original_text:
When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-eagle gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
When the cyber-eagle inflicts {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} on an enemy, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando ataca a un objetivo que tiene {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnerabilidades{/g}, la ciberáguila obtiene la misma bonificación al daño que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}. Su ataque elimina todas las {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnerabilidades{/g} del objetivo.
Cuando la ciberáguila causa el efecto {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} a un enemigo, dicho enemigo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} o recibirá +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnerabilidades{/g}.

languages.text:
当生化猎鹰攻击拥有{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}研究{/g}效果的目标时，会获得与{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}同等程度的伤害加成效果。生化猎鹰攻击后，会移除目标身上所有{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}研究{/g}效果层数。
当生化猎鹰对敌人施加{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}效果时，该名敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，否则会被施加{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76}层{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}研究{/g}效果。
languages.original_text:
When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-eagle gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
When the cyber-eagle inflicts {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} on an enemy, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
当生化猎鹰攻击拥有{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}研究{/g}效果的目标时，会获得与{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}同等程度的伤害加成效果。生化猎鹰攻击后，会移除目标身上所有{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}研究{/g}效果层数。
当生化猎鹰对敌人施加{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}效果时，该名敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，否则会被施加{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76}层{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}研究{/g}效果。

languages.text:
Lorsqu'il attaque une cible avec des {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnérabilités{/g}, le cyber-aigle bénéficie du même bonus de dégâts que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}. Son attaque supprime tous les cumuls de {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnérabilité{/g} de la cible.
Lorsque le cyber-aigle inflige {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Obstruction{/g} à un ennemi, ce dernier doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76}. En cas d'échec, il subit +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} cumuls de {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnérabilité{/g}.
languages.original_text:
When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-eagle gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
When the cyber-eagle inflicts {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} on an enemy, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsqu'il attaque une cible avec des {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnérabilités{/g}, le cyber-aigle bénéficie du même bonus de dégâts que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}. Son attaque supprime tous les cumuls de {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnérabilité{/g} de la cible.
Lorsque le cyber-aigle inflige {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Obstruction{/g} à un ennemi, ce dernier doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76}. En cas d'échec, il subit +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} cumuls de {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnérabilité{/g}.

languages.text:
Siber kartal, {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}sömürü{/g} altındaki bir hedefe saldırdığında, verilecek hasara {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} ile aynı bonusları kazanır. Saldırısı, hedefteki tüm {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}sömürüleri{/g} ortadan kaldırır.
Siber kartal, bir düşmanda {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenen{/g} etkisi oluşturduğunda o düşman −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}sömürüye{/g} maruz kalır.

When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-eagle gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
When the cyber-eagle inflicts {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} on an enemy, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}.

Когда киберорел накладывает на цель эффект {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g}, она выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} и в случае провала получает {uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимостей{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} を持つ対象を攻撃する場合、サイバー・イーグルは{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g} と同様に与えるダメージにボーナスを得る。その攻撃は対象からすべての{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} を取り除く。
サイバー・イーグルが{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害{/g} を敵に与える場合、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g} に-{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g} でパスするか、+{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}搾取{/g} を受けなければならない。
languages.original_text:
When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-eagle gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
When the cyber-eagle inflicts {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} on an enemy, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} を持つ対象を攻撃する場合、サイバー・イーグルは{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} と同様に与えるダメージにボーナスを得る。その攻撃は対象からすべての{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} を取り除く。
サイバー・イーグルが{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害{/g} を敵に与える場合、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗テスト{/g} に-{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g} でパスするか、+{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}搾取{/g} を受けなければならない。

languages.text:
Attackiert der Cyber-Adler ein Ziel mit {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Ausnutzen{/g}, erhält er denselben Schadensbonus wie der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g}. Sein Angriff entfernt alle {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Ausnutzen{/g}-Stapel des Ziels.
Belegt der Cyber-Adler einen Gegner mit {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Gehemmt{/g}, muss dieser Gegner eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} bestehen, um nicht mit +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Ausnutzen{/g} belegt zu werden.
languages.original_text:

When the cyber-eagle inflicts {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} on an enemy, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|AGISave|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or suffer +{uip|ExploitNumber|5fc198b41b194129a8d29658840ddf76} {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}.
